doc.title: Suraag: The Clue
doc.plot: SURAAG means the clue and Bharat (Sudesh Berry) the young and dynamic CID Officer with his sixth sense and the ability to look beyond gets all the clues which help him solve the most complicated and mysterious cases. Only the impossible cases come to CID Officer Bharat but impossible won does not exists in Bharat's dictionary. With his the ability to take people into confidence wisdom to delegate smart people and after making a through study of the case Bharat gets cracking and has no one to best him which actually makes the serial so very peppy. Crime based serial SURAAG has one complete story in every serial of one how that holds back the viewers.
